champ_0200_ground_02: That about wraps up the interview.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]And let me be the first to congratulate you,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]...[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_04:
You just passed the first part of the Champion
Assessment![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_05a:
On your first try too, no less! Don’t think
anyone’s done that since Nemona.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_05b:
Honestly I don’t know why you bungled it
before...[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_06:
But anyway, time to switch gears and get ready
for the next segment.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_07: The second segment is what we call the Elite Test.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_08:
And you’ll be facing the Elite Four in Pokémon
battles![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_09:
...I guess that’s pretty obvious from the name of
the test, huh.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_10:
Anyway, we’re the best the League has to offer.
You’ll be facing us four in a row—no turning back.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_11:
This won’t be a cakewalk—I promise you that.
Make sure you’re all ready, then go into the\r
room behind me.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0200_ground_12:
Once you’re ready for the Elite Test, go into
the room behind me.[VAR 0114(0013)]
